ingredients.ingredient: 1 Â½ cups butter, melted and divided
1 (16 ounce) package frozen hash brown potatoes
1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of chicken soup

cookingTips: Thaw hash browns slightly and break apart before mixing to ensure even distribution
Don't fully thaw potatoes; mixing while partially frozen prevents clumping
Cover casserole with foil for first 30 minutes to prevent over-browning, then uncover to finish
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How would you prevent this potato casserole from becoming watery or dry while baking?
